Text:
It doesn't work. There is no SKIDROW folder (well, there is a Dishonored SKIDROW, but no just skidrow.)

 if anyone has a way to make it work, I would be pleased to hear it.

Another thing, when installed, the shortcut of the game opens Steam on the community page of Dishonored. I don't think it's a good thing ._.
Anyone know where to get the pre-order content?
@Foolrkrum I've been searching for that as well. No luck so far.
Yeah, it pisses me off a little bit that there doesn't seem to be more scene interest in it. I really don't want to play the game until I can get the full package. D:
